such conceited nonsense, idiot.\""},{"lineNumber":241614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とほほ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh dear...\""},{"lineNumber":241615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それで、話とはなんです？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what is this talk about?\""},{"lineNumber":241616,"originalJapaneseLine":"行軍の休憩中、二振りの剣と刀は、","translatedEnglishLine":"During a break in the march, the two secretly."},{"lineNumber":241618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かってんだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You understand, don't you?"},{"lineNumber":241619,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王、リトルプリンセスのことだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's about the Demon King, the Little Princess.\""},{"lineNumber":241620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":241621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ、実際、いつ頃魔王になる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, when exactly will she become the Demon King?\""},{"lineNumber":241622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今はなんとも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can't say for sure right now..."},{"lineNumber":241623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですが、猶予はそうなさそうです」","translatedEnglishLine":"But it seems there isn't much time to a way to kill her.\""},{"lineNumber":241627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":241628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂の相棒は女の子は殺さん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My partner doesn't kill girls."},{"lineNumber":241629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほぼ絶対にだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Almost certainly not.\""},{"lineNumber":241630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「となれば、お前さんがやるしかない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, you'll have no choice but to do it."},{"lineNumber":241631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手段は問わん」","translatedEnglishLine":"The method doesn't matter.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今はまだ抑えられてるけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm still holding it back for now, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっといずれその感情でいっぱいになっちゃう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure someday I'll be overwhelmed with that feeling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと私、耐えきれない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure I won't be able to endure it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなを殺したくなんてないの……
世界を壊したくなんてないの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want to destroy the world..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王になんて、なりたくないよう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want to become the Demon King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光は刀から人の姿に戻り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikko returned from the form of a sword to a human shape,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっと美樹を胸の中で包み込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gently embraced Miki to his chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、最後まで諦めてはいけないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you must not give up until the very end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が母親に甘えるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki clung to him even more tightly, like a child seeking her mother,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にわんわんはどこかへ消えていた。
いずれ来る、魔王への覚醒。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The awakening into the Demon King that will come someday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸が不安で押し潰されそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her chest felt like it would be crushed by anxiety.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと大丈夫だよ、って健太郎くんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro-kun surely said it would be okay,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今頃、どこで何してるかなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder where he is and what he's doing right now."
"Oh dear, are you catching a cold?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへ、美樹ちゃんが僕の噂をしているようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, it seems Miki-chan was talking about me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自惚れたこと抜かすな、アホ」
行軍の休憩中、二振りの剣と刀は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During a break in the march, the two swords,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集団から離れて内緒話をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: separated from the group and whispered secretly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王、リトルプリンセスのことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about the Demon King, the Little Princess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ、実際、いつ頃魔王になる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, when exactly will she become the Demon King?"
"I can't say for sure right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、猶予はそうなさそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it seems there isn't much time to spare."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ、なんとかして殺せ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find a way to kill her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂の相棒は女の子は殺さん。
「となれば、お前さんがやるしかない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, you'll have no choice but to do it.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
